name: Chaingmail
flavorText: The magical properties of a piece of armor such as this intrigue the mind. It was constructed from the finest parts of many different armors that were worn by many different heroes.
flavorTextHtml: The magical properties of a piece of armor such as this intrigue the mind. It was constructed from the finest parts of many different armors that were worn by many different heroes.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: After earning a survival bonus, quickly heal to full Life.
secondary.text: After earning a survival bonus, quickly heal to full Life.
